TopicTitle: Pink lines around surface of The Mun after orbital survey

Articles.Content:
So i did a orbital survey in orbit around the mun not knowing what it is and now i have some wierd pink lines that nearly cover all of The Mun's surface.

What arethey? And how do i get rid of them?
The pink lines are from the scan, and it shows where ore is.. In the map view, select the Mun and there's a resource tab on the toolbar where you can change or remove the lines.
Thanks! now i can build drill stations.
